article_text:
Fayetteville, NC (28302)

Today

Sunshine and a few clouds. High 89F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Clear to partly cloudy. Low 61F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

og.description: "I won't use foul language. I'm just not going to do it. ... I'll never do it again, actually."
og.title: Dana Milbank: Foul-language barrier
